data.description: Apache authen module for use with Yale CAS
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is a mod_perl authentication handler for use with
    Apache. A consistent naming convention has been chosen to match
    other authentication modules currently on CPAN. There currently
    exists no mod_perl module that ties into a Yale CAS server and is
    available for public use.

    This module provides a good alternative to user not wanting to use
    the C Apache module shipped with the Yale CAS Client distribution.
    Also provided is the ability to handle proxiable credentials, which
    is not possible with the Apache module that ships with the current
    stable cas-client distribution.
